articles.description: Gold and silver rose to record highs as fears about credit quality in the US economy and heightened frictions between Washington and Beijing strengthened demand for havens.

articles.title: AI Companies Now ‘Disrupting’ SF Rental Market By Giving People Free Apartments, Rent Stipends - SFist
articles.description: It will make renters sick that they have to compete with AI sector workers whose cash-flush companies pay their rent for them. It will make renters even sicker to hear those AI companies do this to make their workplaces like “a frat house.”

articles.title: US Nears Tariff Relief for Auto Industry After Lobbying Push - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The White House is poised to ease tariffs on the US auto industry, a move that would deliver a major win for carmakers that have aggressively lobbied to stem the fallout from record-level import duties.

articles.title: Stocks Give Up Gains Again. Here's Why. - Barron's
articles.description: The Dow, S&P 500, and Nasdaq fell Thursday as the stock market reacted to bank worries and the latest in the Trump-China trade war. The 10-year yield dropped below 4%.
